overview: Hop into the fun with the goofiest bugs around. When a lonely snail realizes how slow he is compared to the other creatures, Bartle Bee steps up to help him catch a ride on the fastest vehicle around. And when a newborn baby is hatched, Cosmo and Flutterby ask to babysit, but taking care of a baby is a lot harder then it looks! One thing is for sure, love is the only thing that can keep these bugs together.  They may be small but these little insects have a lot of heart!
title: Pondemonium 8: Buzzed 2
